Title: A New Season aka Suck It Cancellation Bear
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Dan Fogelman, Jeremy Hall (story editor), Julia Grob (staff writer)
Actors: Joshua Sasse, Timothy Omundson, Vinnie Jones, Mallory Jansen
Plot: Galavant and the crew are shipwrecked thanks to bad advice, and their overland trek back to Richard's kingdom leads to a bar in West Hollow-wood then to a fortune teller.
